page.title: 07The Fishermen
page.content: My dad is a fisherman,and has been one for about 15 years.When he has to go fishing his friend Jim May,who is the skipper,gives him a ring the night before to tell him what time he has to leave in the morning.Whatever time he has to go its usually quite early.Sometimes he has to help make the nets and then go fishing.Jim's and dad's boat is called{The Orcades }and they catch lobsters,crabs and fish for a seafood shop run by Jim's wife and my mum.{The Orcades}can go 25 knots altogether.There are not any main fish actually in the harbour so they have to go further,to places such as Bude and Hartland Bay.Dad and Jim leave{hand made}lobster pots in the rock_pools by the break_water to catch them.They sell most of the lobsters and crabs in the shop,they have a tank with lobsters in.
